#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdlib>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		long long int e = n/2;
		long long int o = n/2;
		if(n%2!=0)
		{
			o = o+1;
		}
		long long int sum = o*o - e*(e+1);
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
	}
}
